simj.util.logging

Class HTMLFormatter

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.util.logging.Formatter
      • simj.util.logging.HTMLFormatter

  • public class HTMLFormatter
extends Formatter
    This class implements an HTMLFormatter for log records. The output is usually written to a file.
    Author:
    Patrik Fuhrer

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      HTMLFormatter(String name)
      Constructs an instance of an HTML formatter.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      String format(LogRecord record)
      Formats a given log record in an HTML way.
      String getHead(Handler handler)
      Returns the header string for the HTML file containing the formatted records of this logger.
      String getTail(Handler handler)
      Returns the tail string for the HTML file containing the formatted records of this logger.

        formatMessage

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Constructor Detail

      • HTMLFormatter

        public HTMLFormatter(String name)
        Constructs an instance of an HTML formatter.
        Parameters:
        name - The name this formatter uses to display a title.

    • Method Detail

      • format

        public String format(LogRecord record)
        Formats a given log record in an HTML way.
        Specified by:
        format in class Formatter
        Parameters:
        record - The log record to format.
        Returns:
        An HTML string representing the formatted log record.

      • getHead

        public String getHead(Handler handler)
        Returns the header string for the HTML file containing the formatted records of this logger. This method is called just after the handler using this formatter is created. This method overrides the empty java.util.logging.Formatter.getHead method.
        Overrides:
        getHead in class Formatter
        Parameters:
        handler - The target handler.
        Returns:
        The header string for the HTML file containing the formatted records of this logger.

      • getTail

        public String getTail(Handler handler)
        Returns the tail string for the HTML file containing the formatted records of this logger. This method is called just after the handler using this formatter is closed. This method overrides the empty java.util.logging.Formatter.getTail method.
        Overrides:
        getTail in class Formatter
        Parameters:
        handler - The target handler.
        Returns:
        The tail string for the HTML file containing the formatted records of this logger.
